document_data.name: Tintoram's Select
document_data.mainbody:
'''Tintoram's Select''' was a [[blackberry]] [[brandy]] famous throughout the [[Realms]].
{{TOC limit}}
document_data.Description:
This distilled [[wine]] was known for its potency and rich flavor. It had a strong aroma of sweetness, and was dark purple—almost black—in color.

Tintoram's Select was bottled in purple [[glass]] flasks with long, narrow necks. Its cork was sealed with [[lead]].
document_data.Source: Tintoram's Select was distilled from blackberries by [[halfling]]s in the [[Purple Hills]].
document_data.History: A bottle of Tintoram's Select was used to [[poison]] [[Zaranda Star]], when she was staying at the [[Ith-Side Inn]] in [[Ithmong]] in [[Tarsakh]] of the {{YearlinkName|1367}}.
document_data.Reputation: A flask of Tintoram's Select was considered a valuable gift.
